seo.title: Ravello to Positano by Bus | Hostel Brikette
seo.description: Step-by-step directions from Ravello to Positano via Amalfi using SITA buses, with timetable tips, stop details, and the final walk to Hostel Brikette.

intro.title: Ravello to Positano – via Amalfi by Bus
intro.body: Travel from Ravello to Positano with a simple change in Amalfi. This guide covers where to buy and validate SITA tickets, how to read the timetable, and what to expect when changing in Amalfi — plus the short walk from Positano’s Chiesa Nuova stop to Hostel Brikette.

callouts.tip: Need every transport option? Open the %HOWTO:how-to-get-here|{{guideLabel}}% for ferries, taxis, and mixed itineraries.
